product_name: REI Sub Kilo +15 Sleeping Bag - Women's Long - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Sub Kilo +15 women's long sleeping bag with a left-hand zip offers a women-specific fit and extra length, so you don't need to resort to a men's bag on your 3-season backpacking adventures. Women-specific fit features narrower shoulders and more room in the hips than men's bags; extra length accommodates sleepers up to 6 ft. tall. 3-season bag features premium 750-fill-power goose down insulation and a downproof ripstop polyester shell and soft polyester taffeta lining. Vertical Baffle construction lets the goose down remain fully lofted and keeps it from shifting and migrating, preventing cold spots. Contoured hood, roomy footbox, full-length locking zipper, full-length draft tube and draft collar all keep body heat in and cold air out. Internal pocket keeps all your essentials-headlamp, watch, glasses-close at hand and easy to find in the dark. Differentiated drawcords (one round, one flat) let you adjust hood and neck easily, even in the dark. Pad loops provide attachment points to keep your sleeping bag and pad together to avoid rolling off onto the cold ground (straps not included). Left-hand zip design lets you zip the REI Sub Kilo +15 bag to compatible right-hand zip bags to create a double bed. Comes with stuff sack and large cotton storage bag. Special buy.
